info.title: AODocs REST API
info.description: The AODocs REST API exposes most of the features of AODocs. It can be used to implement custom applications, third-party integration, bulk tools, or just to experiment with AODocs.

tags.name: document
tags.description: Manage documents (beta version, subject to change)

get.description: Lists the possible states for the document by the current user.
Lists transitions for the document where the current user is involved.
Lists the history of transitions for the document.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of transition history items per page. (Default: 50)

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page. This should be set to the value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous response.

get.description: Gets transition for the document where the current user is involved.

addValidatorToPermissions.description: Whether to add the workflow validator to the draft's permissions

applyPreviousVersionPermissions.description: Whether to apply the main version's permissions

draftActionPrefix.description: The prefix to apply to the draft version's title

permissions.description: The list of permissions to apply to the draft version

event.description: The type of event (in workflow transitions: ON_STATE_ENTER_BEFORE_TRANSITION, ON_ENTER_STATE_AFTER_TRANSITION, ON_LEAVE_STATE_BEFORE_TRANSITION or ON_STATE_LEAVE_AFTER_TRANSITION, in relations: ON_RELATION_FILTER or ON_RELATION_RENDER, in classes: ON_DOCUMENT_UPDATE or ON_DOCUMENT_DISPLAY)

params.description: The map key/value of the parameters

scriptId.description: The ID of the custom script

scriptName.description: The name of the custom script (read-only field)

params.description: The map key/value of the parameters

scriptId.description: The ID of the custom script

scriptName.description: The name of the custom script (read-only field)

name_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only field)

system.description: Indicates whether this field is a system field or not (read-only field)

createNewDocumentVersion.description: Whether to create a new version of the documents via this transition (redundant with transitionType = VERSION)

createdTime.description: The time at which the workflow transition was created

discardCheckedOutDocument.description: Whether to discard draft documents via this transition (redundant with transitionType = DISCARD)

fixedTime.description: The date from which the transition should be triggered (if automatic transition based on static date/time)

id.description: The ID of the workflow transition

lastModifiedTime.description: The time at which the workflow transition was last modified

propertyTime.description: The ID of the date (or date/time) property from whose value the transition should be triggered (if automatic transition based on property value)

targetStateId.description: The ID of the target state of the transition

targetStateName.description: The name of the target state of the transition

targetStateName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the target state of the transition

trigger.description: The state change trigger. Possible values: SIMPLE_VALIDATION, PARALLEL_VALIDATION, TIME_TRIGGER, DATA_TRIGGER, DIRECT_CHANGE

date.description: Date at which the validation occurred

validated.description: Whether the user has already processed the transition for the document

amount.description: The amount of units to wait until the transition is triggered

unit.description: The unit for the elapsed time to wait (minute, hour, day, month)

actionId.description: The ID of the human workflow action

appliedName.description: The applied name of the workflow action

appliedName_i18n.description: The internationalized applied name of the workflow action

commentPlaceholderText.description: The comment placeholder text (maximum of 80 characters)

commentPlaceholderText_i18n.description: The internationalized comment placeholder text (read-only field)

mandatoryComment.description: Whether a comment is mandatory when triggering the workflow action

name.description: The name of the workflow action

reminders.description: The list of reminders for the transition

validateByAll.description: Whether the transition is a parallel transition

displayName.description: The displayed name if type = USER, GROUP or ROLE

role.description: The level of the permission (READER, COMMENTER, WRITER or ATTACHMENT_EDITOR)

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture (for users)

type.description: The type of permitted audience (ANYONE, DOMAIN, GROUP, USER or ROLE)

value.description: The email address if type = USER or GROUP, the ID of the role if type = ROLE

withLink.description: Whether the audience will have access with the link

propertyId.description: The ID of the property for the condition

value.description: The value for the condition (if operator is neither EMPTY or NOT_EMPTY)

after.description: Whether the transition should be triggered from the property value plus the offset (vs. from the property value minus the offset)

amount.description: The amount of units to wait before/after the property value to trigger the transition

unit.description: The unit for the offset (minute, hour, day, month)

classId.description: The ID of the class when type = FIELD

className.description: The name of the class when type = FIELD

description.description: The description for type in GROUP, ROLE, FIELD

displayName.description: The display name of the user or group, the name of the role (read-only field)

displayName_i18n.description: The display name of the user or group, the internationalized name of the role (read-only field)

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture (especially for users)

type.description: The type of person (user, group, role, field based, domain i.e. everybody)

value.description: The email address if user or group, the ID of the role, the ID of the class/field (ignored if type = DOMAIN)

senderTemplate.description: The displayed sender of the email

notifyHumanActionPerformer.description: Whether to notify the workflow validators

recipients.description: The list of person to notify

applyActionToDocuments.description: (Deprecated) The action to apply when entering the workflow state

classReadOnlyDocumentsNotCheckedOut.description: The mode that defined whether documents are read-only if not checked-out at the document class level

createdTime.description: The time at which the workflow state was created

customActions.description: The list of custom actions to apply on the workflow state

description.description: The description of the workflow state

displayFlags.description: The flags to control display of the workflow state in the application (HIDDEN_FROM_? where ? = WORKFLOW_TASKS, BROWSEBY or VIEW_FILTERS)

draftDocuments.description: Whether the workflow state is a draft state

hiddenFields.description: The list of fields to be hidden in the workflow state (id is read/write, name is readonly)

id.description: The ID of the workflow state

lastModifiedTime.description: The time at which the workflow state was last modified

mandatoryFields.description: The list of fields to be mandatory in the workflow state (id is read/write, name is readonly)

name.description: The name of the workflow state

name_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the workflow state

permissions.description: The list of permissions when inheriting them from the workflow state

readOnlyDocumentsNotCheckedOut.description: The mode to control whether the documents are read-only if not checked-out

readOnlyFields.description: The list of fields to be read-only in the workflow state (id is read/write, name is readonly)

resetDocumentPermissions.description: Whether to reset explicit permissions when entering the workflow state

transitions.description: The list of workflow transitions from this workflow state

id.description: The ID of the workflow email template

name.description: The name of the workflow email template

createNewDocumentVersion.description: Whether to create a new version of the documents via this transition (redundant with transitionType = VERSION)

createdTime.description: The time at which the workflow transition was created

discardCheckedOutDocument.description: Whether to discard draft documents via this transition (redundant with transitionType = DISCARD)

fixedTime.description: The date from which the transition should be triggered (if automatic transition based on static date/time)

id.description: The ID of the workflow transition

lastModifiedTime.description: The time at which the workflow transition was last modified

propertyTime.description: The ID of the date (or date/time) property from whose value the transition should be triggered (if automatic transition based on property value)

targetStateId.description: The ID of the target state of the transition

targetStateName.description: The name of the target state of the transition

targetStateName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the target state of the transition

audience.description: The mode of audience to remind: PENDING (everyone in the audience of the transition except those who validated it - if parallel transition), EXCLUSIVE (for simple transitions: only the users who haven't validated the parallel transition if any on the state, for parallel transition it's similar to PENDING)

emailTemplateId.description: The ID of a workflow template email (type = ACTION_REMINDER) to format reminder email

id.description: The ID of the reminder (read-only field)
